Examples.ExampleName: Create a new active eSignature user
Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to create a new eSignature user and activate their account automatically.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to create a new eSignature user and activate their account automatically.
Examples.PageTitle: Create a new active eSignature user
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Create a new active eSignature user

Examples.ExampleName: Create a new active user for CLM and eSignature
Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to create a new DocuSign user (valid for both CLM and eSignature APIs) and activate their account automatically.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to create a new DocuSign user (valid for both CLM and eSignature APIs) and activate their account automatically.
Examples.PageTitle: Create an active CLM + eSign user
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Create a new active user for CLM and eSignature

Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to bulk export user accounts within an organization into a CSV (comma-separated value) file.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to bulk export user accounts within an organization into a CSV (comma-separated value) file.

Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to audit the users in your account by retrieving the profiles of users that were modified after a specified date.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to bulk import users and add user data from an example CSV (comma-separated value) file into a DocuSign Admin organization.

Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to audit the users in your account by retrieving the profiles of users that were modified after a specified date.

Examples.ExampleName: Retrieve the user's DocuSign profile using an email address
Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to obtain the user’s DocuSign profile information across all DocuSign accounts by specifying the user’s email address.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to obtain the user’s DocuSign profile information across all DocuSign accounts by specifying the user’s email address.
Examples.PageTitle: Get user profile data by email
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Retrieve the user's DocuSign profile using an email address

Examples.ExampleName: Retrieve the user's DocuSign profile using a User ID
Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to obtain the user’s DocuSign profile information across all DocuSign accounts by specifying the user’s User ID.
Examples.ExampleDescriptionExtended: Demonstrates how to obtain the user’s DocuSign profile information across all DocuSign accounts by specifying the user’s User ID
Examples.PageTitle: Get user profile data by User ID
Examples.ResultsPageHeader: Retrieve the user's DocuSign profile using a User ID

Examples.ExampleName: Update user product permission profiles using an email address
Examples.ExampleDescription: Demonstrates how to update user product permission profiles. There may only be one permission profile assigned to a user per product.
